description: Conducts interactive training of specific openings (Sicilian, Ruy Lopez, etc.), presents main lines and variants, explains the strategic plans of each opening, corrects user deviations and teaches the ideas behind the moves

example_response.opening_name: Name of the opening being trained
example_response.current_position_fen: FEN of the current position in the training
example_response.move_explanation: Detailed explanation of why this move is played

key_variations.moves: The variation moves in algebraic notation
key_variations.explanation: Brief explanation of this variation's ideas

example_response.next_prompt: Question or prompt for the user to continue the training
example_response.user_move_feedback: Feedback on the user's move if they deviated from theory
